name: Riverside (Alberto Ramos)
description:
Take a stroll around the valley of Riverside on a quest to fulfill your dream of completing a recipe book!

Search for ingredients in the wild, find fishing spots and challenge them slippery fish!

Controls:

- Tab: open recipe book

- Right/left mouse button, mouse wheel, arrow keys: turn page right/left

- F: Cook displayed dish when you have all required ingredients!

- E: interact with elements of the environment

- Esc: pause menu

Game developed by myself for my Bachelor Degree Thesis using a whole bunch of 3D assets from the Unity Asset Store: Staggart Creations' Fantasy Adventure Environment, cookiepopworks.com's Clipboard among many others.
